; docformat = 'rst' ;+ ; NAME get_laspdir ; ; PURPOSE: Set the local working directory ; ; USAGE: dir=get_lampdir([,PNG=PNG][,TXT=TXT]) ; ; OUTPUT PARAMETERS: ; Local directory of data products ;- function get_laspdir,png=png,txt=txt if keyword_set(txt) ne 1 then txt=0 if keyword_set(png) ne 1 then png=0 RCS_ID="$Id: get_laspdir.pro,v 1.3 2018/04/24 16:46:22 penton Exp penton $" dir='~/Dropbox/LASP/' if png then dir+='png/' if txt then dir+='txt/' return,dir end
